issue.title: [R] Minor fix for backwards compatibility on Linux installation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8206](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8206). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In 0.16, the recommendation was to set `LIBARROW_DOWNLOAD=true` to install with dependencies, and this would include getting a binary. But the recent refactor to Linux installation didn't carry this setting forward correctly.
